list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: turn or cause to turn or whirl around quickly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the girl spun around in alarm
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô gái xoay quanh trong báo động

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: draw out (wool, cotton, or other material) and convert it into threads, either by hand or with machinery.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an old lady sat, spinning thread
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một bà già ngồi, sợi quay

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a news story or other information) a particular interpretation, especially a favorable one.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were spinning for salmon in the lake
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đang quay cuồng cho cá hồi trong hồ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a rapid turning or whirling motion.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he concluded the dance with a double spin
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ông kết luận điệu nhảy với một vòng quay đôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a brief trip in a vehicle for pleasure.
a particular bias, interpretation, or point of view, intended to create a favorable (or sometimes, unfavorable) impression when presented to the public.
